title: School of Medicine Continuing Professional Development
description: Course syllabus for Managing Autism and Other Developmental Disabilities: An Update for Primary Care
cleaned_text: Managing Autism and Other Developmental Disabilities Course Syllabus To view the presentation slides click on the talk title to open the handout for that talk. The syllabus will be available for approximately six months following the activity For optimal viewing of the pdf files, download [Adobe Acrobat Reader](https://get.adobe.com/reader/). Friday, December 11, 2020 [Holistic Psychopharmacology for Children and Youth with Developmental Disabilities](https://www.ohsu.edu/sites/default/files/2020-12/Managing%20Autism_Phelps_Pharm.pdf) - Randall Phelps, MD, PhD [Pediatric Feeding Disorder: Tackling Common Feeding Concerns in Primary Care](https://www.ohsu.edu/sites/default/files/2020-12/Managing_Autism_Wright.pdf) - Amber Wright, MSN, RN, CPNP-PC [GI Disorders in Children with Neurodevelopmental Disabilities](https://www.ohsu.edu/sites/default/files/2020-12/Managing_Autism_Doan.pdf) - Sylvia Doan, MD [Autism: Differential Diagnosis and Management I](https://www.ohsu.edu/sites/default/files/2020-12/Managing_Autism_Phelps.pdf) - Randall Phelps, MD, PhD [Autism Spectrum Disorder: Managing Emotion Regulation and Social Difficulties](https://www.ohsu.edu/sites/default/files/2020-12/Managing_Autism_Miller.pdf) - Kylee Miller, PhD [Sensory Processing](https://www.ohsu.edu/sites/default/files/2020-12/Managing_Autism_Gabaldon.pdf) - Kristin Gabaldon, OTR/L Panel Discussion: Transitioning to Adulthood **No slides
